publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5954 Jackie Baillie: Dumbarton Firm Powers to World Cup Final—That the Parliament congratulates the Dumbarton-based company, Aggreko, on winning a £30 million contract to supply power to this summer’s 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa; understands that the deal will see Aggreko provide power to television companies during the competition; notes that the contract will cover all of the 10 stadiums that are being used; further notes that Aggreko will be a vital component in broadcasting all of the 64 matches to a combined worldwide audience of three billion people, and congratulates Aggreko on another successful contract, which follows on from the Beijing 2008 Olympic Games and Barack Obama’s presidential inauguration.
